simplesect.title: allow-compress()
simplesect.para: Description: Enable on-the-wire compression in the RLTP communication. Note that this option must be enabled both on the server and the client side to have any effect. Enabling compression can significantly reduce the bandwidth required to transport the messages, but can slightly decrease the performance of &abbrev;, reducing the number of transferred messages. The allow-compress() option can be used in source and destination drivers as well. Available in &abbrev; 5.0 and later.
